sentences: Kas teil on luba sellele hoonele siseneda?
context: The Estonian word 'luba' is a noun that means permission, license, or allowance. It refers to official authorization to do something or the right to perform certain actions. In Estonian grammar, it can be used in various cases depending on its function in the sentence - nominative case (luba), genitive case (loa), partitive case (lubad/lubu), etc.
